description: EU General Data Protection Regulation â€” Articles relevant to AI agent data processing

controls.title: Integrity and Confidentiality
controls.description: Personal data shall be processed in a manner that ensures appropriate security, including protection against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking destructive operations prevents accidental data loss or destruction
Blocking arbitrary execution prevents unauthorized data processing

evidence_queries.description: Blocked destructive operation and unauthorized execution counts

gap_recommendations: Block all destructive file and database operations
Block arbitrary code execution by agents
Enable DashClaw DLP scanning for personal data in agent outputs

controls.title: Accountability
controls.description: The controller shall be responsible for, and be able to demonstrate compliance with, the data processing principles.

policy_mappings.rationale: Active guard policies with audit logs demonstrate accountability for agent data processing

evidence_queries.description: Total guard evaluations and compliance report generation history

gap_recommendations: Maintain comprehensive guard decision logs
Generate compliance reports at least quarterly
Document agent data processing activities
Retain audit trails per GDPR requirements (minimum 3 years recommended)

controls.title: Data Protection by Design
controls.description: The controller shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures designed to implement data-protection principles in an effective manner and integrate safeguards into the processing.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking PII access by default implements data protection by design
Approval gates on data access embed privacy into the processing workflow

gap_recommendations: Block or gate all PII access operations
Implement data minimization policies (agents access only necessary data)
Enable DLP scanning for personal data patterns

controls.title: Data Protection by Default
controls.description: The controller shall implement measures for ensuring that, by default, only personal data which are necessary for each specific purpose are processed.

policy_mappings.rationale: Default blocking of PII queries implements data protection by default

evidence_queries.description: PII query block counts demonstrating default-deny for personal data

gap_recommendations: Block PII queries by default, require explicit approval
Implement field-level access controls for personal data
Limit agent access to aggregated/anonymized data where possible

controls.title: Records of Processing Activities
controls.description: Each controller shall maintain a record of processing activities under its responsibility.

policy_mappings.rationale: Guard decision logs serve as records of agent data processing activities

evidence_queries.description: Guard decision log with timestamps, actions, and outcomes

gap_recommendations: Ensure all agent data processing actions are logged
Include purpose, data category, and legal basis in processing records
Generate periodic processing activity reports from guard logs

controls.title: Security of Processing
controls.description: The controller shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.

policy_mappings.rationale: Blocking code execution prevents security vulnerabilities in agent processing
Approval gates on communications prevent unauthorized data disclosure

evidence_queries.description: Security enforcement counts across all policy types

gap_recommendations: Block arbitrary code execution
Gate all outbound communications behind approval
Enable encryption for agent data in transit and at rest
Implement access controls for agent API keys

controls.title: Data Protection Impact Assessment
controls.description: Where a type of processing is likely to result in a high risk to the rights and freedoms of natural persons, the controller shall carry out an assessment of the impact.

policy_mappings.rationale: Risk threshold policies automatically assess impact of agent actions

gap_recommendations: Conduct a DPIA for AI agent data processing activities
Add risk_threshold policies to auto-assess high-risk operations
Document risk assessment methodology for agent operations
Review and update DPIA when agent capabilities change

controls.title: Notification of Personal Data Breach
controls.description: In case of a personal data breach, the controller shall notify the supervisory authority without undue delay.

policy_mappings.rationale: Rate limiting and anomaly detection can identify potential breach indicators

evidence_queries.description: Anomaly detection signals and security alert history

gap_recommendations: Configure automated alerts for potential breach indicators
Enable DashClaw signal detection for anomalous agent behavior
Document breach notification procedures specific to agent operations
Establish agent incident response playbook
